summary: This is an internal email from October 10, 2020, discussing contact with an original FBI Special Agent from the Florida Epstein investigation. The email notes the agent possesses emails with an AUSA and other documents, and outlines a plan to collect certain materials while deeming others unnecessary as they may already be covered by OPR collections.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: Mentioned as having corresponded via email with SA regarding the Epstein case.

connections.description: SA has a number of emails with AUSA regarding the Epstein case, indicating professional communication during the investigation.

events.title: Discussion with original FBI agent
events.description: The email author spoke with SA, an original FBI agent from the Florida Epstein investigation, about emails and documents in his possession.

keyFacts: An original FBI agent (SA) from the Florida Epstein investigation possesses emails with an AUSA and other case documents.
The email authors' view was that they did not need to collect SA's emails with the AUSA, believing they were already encompassed in thousands of emails collected by OPR.
SA was asked to send any emails he received from victims or witnesses, as well as any other potentially discoverable documents from the Epstein investigation.
